official_title: A bill to provide reduced rates for nonprofit senior citizens organizations.

summary.text: Entitles a qualified, nonprofit, senior citizens organization to the reduced postal rates in effect for other qualified nonprofit organizations (currently third class mail rates).

titles.title: A bill to provide reduced rates for nonprofit senior citizens organizations.
